title: News Headline Emotion Roles (GoodNewsEveryone)
description: Annotate emotions in news headlines with semantic roles. Based on Bostan et al., LREC 2020. Identify emotion, experiencer, cause, target, and textual cue.
citation:

    month = may,

    address = "Marseille, France",
    publisher = "European Language Resources Association",
